rules_text:
{4}{R}{G}: Suika Ibuki gets +4/+4 and gains trample until end of turn.
When Suika dies, put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to four target creatures.
Remove eight +1/+1 counters from among creatures you control: Return Suika from the graveyard to the battlefield.
notes:
!tag IaMP
